Actors: Adam Driver, Topher Grace, Laura Harrier, Ryan Eggold
Writer: Spike Lee (screenplay), David Rabinowitz (screenplay), Ron Stallworth (book), Charlie Wachtel (screenplay), Kevin Willmott (screenplay)
Plot: Ron Stallworth, an African-American police officer from Colorado, successfully managed to infiltrate the local Ku Klux Klan and became the head of the local chapter.
Title: Black Klansman
